website_summaries.verdict: A powerful and versatile stick vac that comes with capabilities and features most competitors lack.
pros: Boasts a brilliant display and app compatibility for monitoring cleaning progress
Can sense dirt and adjust suction accordingly
cons: Emptying the dirt bin is a tad messy
Misses some particles on hard floors

customer_reviews.title: Seriously good
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaner with clear display and suction power controls within easy reach. It’s amazingly quiet and completes a large house on a single charge but great to have the second battery for backup. Really great attachment selection, including the filter cleaner which is a great touch. Manoeuvres much better than our previous Dyson cordless and has a convenient flip switch for keeping the power without constantly holding a switch down. Really well thought out appliance, wouldn’t go back to Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Pegasus829

customer_reviews.title: Beats all the other brands, highly recommended for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: So I wanted to give this smart vacuum cleaner a good going through the house and I'm so pleased with my purchase!! I've owned the big brands before and this beats them hands down, very impressed with the smart suction meter which really helps when you need extra power, and the fact that I don't have to physically clean the filter is one less job to do! The accessories that come with it are fantastic and I've used them all, really useful. The fact it comes with a 2 year warranty and £200 cheaper than the latest dyson with better features, more accessories and smarter technologies is a winner for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I say my old chap!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good suction especially when set to max. Comes with the brush roller main suction head and a huge selection of attachments. What you don’t get is the hard flooring main suction head which I bought separately and glad I did as it is amazing on hard surfaces. Amazing looking machine, easy to handle and manoeuvre and with 2 battery's there is never a reason to run out of power. This a good piece of kit, quality materials and well manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended by a friend who spoke highly of this vacuum cleaner and stated that it works even better than the Dyson and I was completely convinced by it just for the first time usage. It can automatically increase the suction force when it encounters dust. I've been using it for over a week and regret not buying it sooner. It's cool, easy to install, and easy to use and clean. I wouldn't hesitate to give it a five-star rating. It's definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Liang

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars 'cos I've not used it yet! Just received, assembled and charging battery
customer_reviews.text: Instructions leave something to be desired: eg no advice on fitting docking station such as minimum height, maximum distance from mains power socket - and worst of all no indication where the mains lead connects to it; after I fitted it to the wall, I had to fumble around with my fingertips to find the socket at the bottom of the docking station. I assume I am correct in saying that the only method of charging is via the docking station? There is no indication of any other means.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Just NOT a Dyson killer
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I really wanted to like this vacuum. It comes really nicely packaged and looks the part. On carpet it was great, however on solid floor is were I noticed a problem. When you release the trigger bits fall out, so it did not suck up the best. Also on max it over heats and stops you useing till it has cooled down. I returned and ordered a Dyson v11 animal. WOW what a difference, the Dyson is so much better. Sucks better, moves better and just feels better. It's a shame as I was hoping it would be better than the Dyson, but it's not. So happy I payed the extra and got the Dyson. Sorry Tineco
customer_reviews.author: Martin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not Fit For Purpose
customer_reviews.text: This is a really badly designed piece of kit. The hole in the brush head is SO small that very little gets through to transfer to the rather small waste bun. Consequently I am forever having to unclog the whole brush head after every other clean. I do not have pets or small children so our house needs just the usual light clean...... dust , small kitchen debris. It cannot even cope with a rose petal!! For this price, in fact for any price it is useless
customer_reviews.author: ninasmum

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Top marks for vacuum power. Easy to use. However the Mini Power Brush is a tight fit on the Wall Mounted Dock--only a nit pick! When the unit is in the Wall Dock and recharging the information displayed on the units screen is upside down! its OK to read though when actually using for cleaning. The flexible long crevice tool seems rather cheap and easily comes apart. The WiFi is a nice toy. Two batteries coming with the vacuum is very good indeed. The filter cleaner is excellent. I am very pleased with the machine and would certainly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Vincent Smith

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work. Disappointed. Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: * Looks better than a Dyson Cons: * Broke within a few months. Repeatedly says it's blocked when it isn't, which affects suction. * Spits dirt and debris out when you switch it off. Even less fun when it's glass you hoovered up and down want to go everywhere... * Small capacity, probably like most handhelds. * Customer service poor. * Dislike Dyson, but wish I'd bought one instead. You'd do well to do the same.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Really surprised.:)
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Feels more sturdy than my old Dyson handheld. Much quieter. The lights a great for seeing the dust. The filter cleaner is amazing and the attachments are brilliant. The trigger lock is also a brilliant addition. I cannot belive Dyson do not have one or the lights. People mentioned about the small dust container. It is small but we always empty after a vac. So no major issue. We simply pop the vac on auto and can do our 3 bed semi on a half battery charge. So still have a battery and a half spare when finished. It is a very good quiet vacuum. No hesitation in recommending it over the more expensive competition.
customer_reviews.author: Nick D

customer_reviews.title: Completely surprised by the quality and performance.
customer_reviews.text: Okay have only used a couple of times so far, however my only regret is I hadn't bought one sooner. Dislikes NONE. The ease and small spaces achievable to give a thorough clean are amazing. The suction available even though more than adequate on auto , is powerful enough to the point of almost unable to push the head. Would willingly recommend to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a result of a number of reviews. First point is that it is heavy on the wrist, much heavier than the Dyson. Also it is not very good at picking up small bits from the hard floor. The head it big as well so cannot get close up to the wall. It is good for the carpet. Finally it is stiff to detach the pole from the main body. Hence only 3 stars.

customer_reviews.title: Pre-filters needed changing after just 9 months
customer_reviews.text: The cleaner does a great job but I need to buy new pre-filters after just 9 months of light domestic use. Although it has a pre-filter cleaning attachment it obviously is not man enough to clear a build-up of fine dust which sets off the blockage warning icon 😱 Also the new filters cost £15 and take 3 weeks for delivery - so don't hold your breath
customer_reviews.author: P_nuts

customer_reviews.title: Blue and red
customer_reviews.text: I just LOVE it. It has made my life so much easier. Can't wait to use it again but the house is looking so much cleaner I don't need to just yet.. Would never have bought a Dyson again for Political reasons Just love the electronic dial on the top which turns to red in a dirty spot and then returns to blue when the dirt has lifted ( red for ages under our bed!!!!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: useless brush head
customer_reviews.text: Great suction, good battery life,lots of nice features let down by a useless brush head!! Just refuses to pick up anything other than light dust, spits out larger debris so you end up chasing bits around the floor, not able to clear up a spillage of sunflower seeds without assistance from the dog. Wouldn't recommend, have stopped using it extremely frustrating to use gone back to old Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dyson Killer
customer_reviews.text: The permanent on, option and the removable batteries are game changes. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: jonesi

customer_reviews.title: A bloom in’ good hoover!
customer_reviews.text: A bloom in’ good hoover! The battery life itself is great but it also comes with a spare battery that can be on charge whilst not in use. You can easily do a whole house on less than one batteries charge but nice to know the second is there if needed. Considerably better than any Dyson on that front. The suction (oi oi) is great and adjusts as necessary or can be overdriven. The only downside is the size of the ‘bag’ as such, needs emptying fairly regularly but to an inconvenient level. I’m overall a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Miles

customer_reviews.title: Purchased an unknown brand and did not regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Despite having great functions such as a dirt sensor, cleanable filters, and a digital display - the best feature has to be the removable batteries. I have been through plenty of cordless vacuums where the batteries would lose charge after a year, rendering the unit useless. While I suspect the life of the Tineco batteries to be no better than the competition, the simple ability to replace an old unit makes this product a best buy in my eyes. Additionally, it feels better built than a Dyson and has some interesting innovations (mentioned above). Only had it for a few weeks so lets see how it performs over time, but for now its a 5/5 from me!
customer_reviews.author: Taj

customer_reviews.title: Emptying Bin issue!
customer_reviews.text: I give it one star because emptying the bin in a nightmare and a messy job, Given that a hoover is about mess free but this one you need to get you hands dirty every time you empty the bin because every dirt or rubbish stays inside which is a big disappointment. Dyson has a power system that's shots out the entire bin. So I'm back to Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel David

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: The best vacuum cleaner we have had. The dirt sensor works really well, I was sceptical before I tried it. Cleaning power on the auto setting is very good. Selection of tools supplied is diverse and includes filter cleaning attachment. The only criticism relates to the dust enclosure which is small, insubstantial and will get broken easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kaisen

customer_reviews.title: A risk worth taking
customer_reviews.text: Instinct would normally take me down the path of Dyson or other recognised brand, but I placed my faith in the large number of positive reviews and wasn’t disappointed. This is a quality item. Easy to set up with an impressive array of adaptors. The vac itself has an intelligent brain to adjust to the level of dust and surface type and it mounts neatly on the wall, charging as it goes. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Broken motor and customer service respond quickly but as yet still no new motor and a broken hoover
customer_reviews.text: started off great but within a few months motor has broken and I'm unable to use the hoover and still waiting for a replacement won't be buying another one very disappointing as first few weeks it was a very good unit although it needed emptying very frequently i want a refund but they will only send me a faulty part don't think customer service is that great
customer_reviews.author: Welsh trio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - beats Dyson and Shark handsdown
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My home now is very clean and it just makes you want to clean. Better than my Shark and I think it's better and cheaper than the best Dyson has to offer
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Good the first few times, but then it fails to suck up lots of small bits
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using the vacuum cleaner the first few times and clearly it works well, however, after a while the vacuum struggles to suck up small bits. I've followed the instructions of cleaning the filter, however, suction remains weak and bits fall out of the mouth of the vacuum when the power is turned off. I've exchanged the motor for a new one, but the situation persists. It is really frustrating that I have to clear up lots of small bits at the end of the vacuum considering I bought this vacuum to make the job less annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Wei Zhong Ho

customer_reviews.title: Oh boy do I love this !!
customer_reviews.text: It’s just everything that you want in a vacuum cleaner. Moved house and daily mess from unpacking was a nightmare. This wonderful machine dealt with it easily. No I’m steeled a quick whizz round the house with this is like dancing with Anton DuBeke !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a fine vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The Timeco 12 arrived next day well packed i had a bit of trouble putting everything together but sorted it out in the end.It is a bit complicated but bear with it and you will find it is a well build soled vacuum a lot cheaper then the dyson v11
customer_reviews.author: david organ

customer_reviews.title: Good not great.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good and when on offer great value. When full price wouldn't recommend. Only minor irritation application cleaning warning misleading, maximum suction drains battery faster than running water. Design more appealing than hideous plasticky Spacey Dyson system.
customer_reviews.author: SSBB

customer_reviews.title: Just brilliant. A which best buy
customer_reviews.text: Was going to buy the Dyson v11 but after spending 41 minutes waiting for them to answer the phone i decided to look for an alternative. So glad I brought this vacuum. The dirt indicator works brilliantly, battery lasts long enough to clean a 3 bedroom house and on auto it is very quiet. It's hard to believe that such a small vacuum cleaner can remove so much dirt and dust. Well done Tineco. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nick shinton

customer_reviews.title: Smart yet simple
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the vacuum, lightweight and easy to use. Everyting makes sense, essambly is straight forward. Great accessories and the extra battery is useful. I wish it came in other colours not just white
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs Z.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once as just recieved it, was amazed how powerful it was and the way it went from rug to laminate floor then uneven ceramic floor with no problem, hoping the rest of the actions are as good
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: The fluffy roller is a must have.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is realy easy to use. The automatic suction knows when it's need more power and it saves battery life. The filter cleaner is also worth to mention no need to wash it and wait 24hours to dry just put it in and the vacuum cleans it. Only thing what is a bit frustrating is the standard motorised unit. It's to big for cleaning under the couch and it pushes larger objects away like cat food . But it also cleans a carpet very good. For that issue I bought the fluffy roller and that's gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Calum

customer_reviews.title: Not all that
customer_reviews.text: OK so let's not beat about the Bush it's no Dyson lookin back now I wish I had spent the extra on a Dyson. Does this replace my trusty Henry absolutely not. Hard floor pickup average battery life poor small dust bin its cheaper than a Dyson now I know why
customer_reviews.author: j mcc

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Since buying this hand held vacuum, we have been very impressed. All aspects of it seem well thought out and so far we have been please with the results. The collection chamber is a little small, but we were aware of this before buying and it is not an issue. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: walt370

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Cleaning system
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is one if not the Best around & it put the latest Dyson to shame, and although it is expensive, it is cheaper than the latest Dyson and a Better cleaner & a joy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rand J

customer_reviews.title: Tineco Pure One.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent performance for a cordless vac. Two replaceable batteries a huge advantage over others. Whilst this, and in my opinion any other cordless vac., will not replace a corded one this has to be one of the best currently available. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum I have ever bought. Did not know that the carpets were so dirty. This vacuum is so powerful!!! Easy to use and love the docking station. Just look at the image. I am waiting for the Tineco FLOOR ONE S3. Will look at buying that as well. Love this company's products. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: JiggaDrex

customer_reviews.title: Seems to cope with everything.
customer_reviews.text: What a great hover. I've had it one month and attacked everything with it. It's brilliant. I think we can retire the Henry. So far, so good. Cat hair, children's hair, building dust. All good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cordless vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: What a great vaccum cleaner this is I used my old Vax while I was waiting for the battery to charge then used my new one and had to empty the dust bucket 5 times. The suction is unbelievable for a battery cleaner and the batteries last around 30 minutes each which is plenty of time to clean my flat. The auto speed , battery life and dust suction indicators are great features. All in all it is the best vacuum cleaner I have ever owned and would highly recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mythredhel

customer_reviews.title: Good but heavy
customer_reviews.text: It’s great but very heavy. It’s worse be said of the position of the battery which acts as a weight at the end of the machine. Need strong arms for above head cobwebs!! Also only 6 weeks after I bought mine it’s £131 cheaper which is really very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Tinks

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, great docking station, a large selection of tools. If Apple made a vacuum this would be it.
customer_reviews.author: GerryL

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend Tineco
customer_reviews.text: I can honestly say that this is the best vacuum cleaner I have ever had. I love everything about it...it even deals with the endless dog hair. Have to admit that I had not heard of Tineco, but after reading reviews I’m so glad I bought one.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but indispensable
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a friend who hated hoovering. My husband was sceptical as he does not have good experience of cordless gadgets. We borrowed our friend's before purchase and we are both completely satisfied with this cleaner. We have a dog and the hairs are dealt with and carpets look cleaner as when new. The only slight drawback is the dirt collection gadget which is small and needs frequent emptying, but this is a small price to pay.
customer_reviews.author: christine gwynth hall

customer_reviews.title: bin content
customer_reviews.text: This the first time that I have bought a handheld vaccum cleaner. What I did not appreciate is how often I have to empty the bin and how fiddly I find it. the 2 batteries are quite useful and I found that I can clean the whole house (3bdrooms) without any problem. I also would have appreciated an extra slot to hold one of the other accessories. Otherwise, easy to use and lightweight. this is really why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: HENRIETTE HARDIMAN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum & Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking about ordering the dyson v11 or this I’m so glad I choose this in the end it’s much lighter and so much more on it, picks up really good also have the app on my phone tells u when filter needs cleaning it has a self cleaning filter system aswell so far so good can’t fault it at all, I contacted customer service aswell and they are fast at responding and great customer service too, overall I know I made the right choice by getting this rather than the dyson :)
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: A Which Best Buy after the Dyson v11.
customer_reviews.text: A good cordless vac, easy to use with plenty of different attachments for use around the house. The attachment for cleaning the filter is an added bonus. The only minor issue is that it doesn’t quite have the ability to pick up small pieces of grit. Not a problem though, I just move the vac to a hard floor and use a brush and dustpan to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: graham1

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought it months ago
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase Complete replacement for corded vacuum We kept our old corded vacuum until we were sure we didn’t need it but that has now taken a one way trip to recycling centre The second battery supplied ensures no problem for major clean of the whole house
customer_reviews.author: Gary Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this hoover. I was thinking to buy a new hoover for a while and did the research to find the best and this certainly is. I have two children and hoover on a regular basis and thought that I'm doing well until I got this one and realised how much rubbish was left by my old hoover. The battery lasts long and I have a spare one if want to do the whole house at a time. It is easy to hoover the stairs (the biggest struggle with my previous).
customer_reviews.author: Beata

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We are a normal sized 3 bed detached but have six cats. I had a Dyson cordless which was good and I thought it did a deep clean albeit only lasting 25 minutes. The Tineco is amazing. It's still picking up months of cat hair and makes the carpet look amazing. The whole house including the stairs is done with one battery in about 15 minutes. Takes the chore out of hoovering.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Forbes

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the price !!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t regret spending this much on this vacuum! Works perfectly well! And it’s simply a beautiful machine! It’s a bit difficult to clean the dustbin considering you are not supposed to wash with water, and the dustbin also seems a little fragile. Besides those, i am really struggling to find negatives. Will update this review as I continue to familiarize with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Godwin Lemgo

customer_reviews.title: Best cordless vacuum I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Really well put together vacuum, with top class moulding, fit and finish. Powerful suction and the convenience of 2 batteries means you can clean virtually continuously.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Allen

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant !
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with this hoover.We an older V8 Dyson but compared to this one is more quieter,better looking , powerful suction and has many extras like the 2 batteries, 2 filters plus the smart functions and the app as well !
customer_reviews.author: Luigi

customer_reviews.title: Really deep clean. Very surprised with quality
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this. I should have bought the full kit with hardwood floor head. Ended up buying this separately. Was amazed by how much dirt it picked up after I used my miele vacuum cleaner first to compare. It really gets all the dirt out of the fibres in the carpet. I have never had to swap to the second battery while doing the full house with it.
customer_reviews.author: shane cahill

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be cleaned regularly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the beginning of December. It works well, but the tubes and dust box need to be cleaned very regularly, otherwise it starts malfunctioning.
customer_reviews.author: Vincereading

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality hoover. As expected is a bit less strong to Dyson, but overall great quality and extremely good customer support. I m satisfied with the product so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Well Made
customer_reviews.text: It’s really well made and in my opinion better value than the over priced Dyson products.
customer_reviews.author: Sound Hire

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good
customer_reviews.text: Overall great, love the ease of use, battery life and display information. I wish it had a little more suction, but understand this is the best available for a light weight cordless vacum right now. I also would have liked to have the hard floor attachment which was not available in the UK at the time of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: Game changer, buy one now
customer_reviews.text: Game changer. Does the whole house with ease and great on all surfaces. The fact that there is a second battery makes it a lot better than the Dyson equivalent for a cheaper price. Great product and has made cleaning a pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Tim O.

customer_reviews.title: Tineco is really good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Does the job as a new Dyson but for better price and much more accesories. Very happy with my purchase Tineco cordless vacuum cleaner. Just one thing - when I put it on max power the battery drains very quickly but i was wondering is it supposed to be like that? Thanks Tineco team
customer_reviews.author: Renaldas Balbierius

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Greta product, high tech cleaner. Great it comes with 2 batteries so one always charged. Would be nice to have the hard floor roller as part of the package rather than an extra. Very easy to use and manoeuvrable. Delivery prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Jan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic item.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably good vacuum cleaner. Have used it for the few weeks before writing this review. Am so happy with it. Even kids likes to hovering around.
customer_reviews.author: alla

customer_reviews.title: The amazing tineco pure one s12
customer_reviews.text: Just an amazing vacuum! I cant compliment this vacuum enough. Suction power, the smart features, the filter cleaning tool. I actually love using this machine highly recommend by me and my wife and my mother. worth every pound :)
customer_reviews.author: Majid Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! Thanks Tineco!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best vacuum I have ever owned! Amazing quality, suction, battery power and more! I previously had the Dyson V8 and that was not that amazing. The tineco sucked up so much dirt which the Dyson never collected. I'm so happy with my product! Thanks Tineco!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Kaptur

customer_reviews.title: State of the tech , that works in the real world
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it transitions between Capet and hard-floor automatically and the suction is very impressive. Sometimes state of the art falls short but on this occasion it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: UK SPOOKS

customer_reviews.title: Housework
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of months use I can not fault this vacuum cleaner. It really is better than a Dyson in terms of value and performance. Having a second battery has meant I have never ran out of juice when cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: JPN GY

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: really pleased with purchase it appears to work better than my upright Dyson. the only minor point is the small size of the sust container. the battery life is ok but reduces very quickly if you select max power.
customer_reviews.author: windy

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd known about this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful - very light, easy to use. Do have to change the 'bin' about three times on doing a four bed home, but that's more hygienic than the larger bins where the dust stays in for weeks until it gets changed. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L M Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Design
customer_reviews.text: I have four cats, so the house used to get very 'furry'. My Dyson simply couldn't cope. I just love this vacuum cleaner. It's easier to use and gets up a lot more dust, dirt and fur. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nelmes

customer_reviews.title: My favourite vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I can't thank you enough for bringing this product to the market.. fantastic vacuum cleaner 5 Star's all the way😂😂😂😂😂
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN VALENTINE

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant service. Delivered day after order. Love the machine but the motor part is a bit heavier than I expected. When its put together the suction is as good as Dyson. Lots of different tools. Mine came with 2 batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just about lasted for 12 months
customer_reviews.text: Very hard going after a few months of good service, but it is very difficult to clean, runs out of battery very quickly, then dies, sometimes after only 5 minutes. I think we will be going back to Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant product the best vacuum cleaner ever simple to assemble the digital reading tells you every thing you need to know. Two batteries mean continuous cleaning and tools for every situation. I can't say enough good things about this product
customer_reviews.author: lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Really good vacuum, so glad I brought this and not the dyson v11. Would not hesitate to recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: L sims

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: Like this hoover used on old carpets regularly hoover with an old bagged machine. They now look like new. Really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.Setchell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent so far, best thing is being able to clean the whole house without having to wait for hours to recharge the battery as I had to do with my previous cordless which was Dyson animal.
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Positive Experience
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had our vacuum cleaner for a few weeks now and cleaning so much easier! Great benefit to have 2 batteries and minimal storage required. Would recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nanna

customer_reviews.title: Battery power
customer_reviews.text: Product only arrived with one battery my decision to buy this product was based on the product with two batteries next time I will buy a Dyson as it says it only comes with one battery
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it 'says on the tin' Easy to use, main brush great for getting under sofas etc and other tools really handy We're finding dust and dirt we didn't know we had!
customer_reviews.author: IPB

customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Great on carpet, poor on hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a couple of months now. It is great on carpeted floors, the battery life is very good and generally the build quality and features are pretty impressive. However, it really struggles on hard floors, especially when it comes to dealing with larger bits of dirt, crumbs of food, etc. Apparently there is an extra attachment for hard flooring but I can’t seem to find it available for purchase anywhere. Given that our downstairs is entirely hard flooring, I’m finding myself having tosweep the floor just as much as using the vacuum. If our home was fully carpeted then I’d be satisfied, but since it’s not, I can’t help but feel disappointed with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C&C

product_meta.title: Tineco Cordless Vacuum Cleaner PURE ONE S12 Handheld Stick Vacuum Smart Suction, Digital Display Screen 500W Rating Power App Controls High Suction Power Carpet & Hard Floors
feature_bullets: Features iLoopTM Smart Sensor Technology that senses hidden dirt and debris, adjusts suction power in real time and 2500 mAh runtimes up to 50 minutes for complete cleaning confidence
Ultra-high performance 500W motor provides up to 6x more suction power compared ordinary cordless vacuums for super multi-surface cleaning power
Lightweight, cordless design easily maneuvers through every room
Easily converts to a handheld vacuum with versatile attachments to reach corners, stairs and crevices

PURE ONE S12 cordless vacuum cleaner includes: LED Multi-tasker Power Brush, Mini Power Brush, (2) Pre-Filters, Automatic Pre-Filter Cleaning Tool, 2-in-1 Dusting Brush, Crevice Tool, Dual Charging Wall-Mounted Dock.
